transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, sir aapko call aaya tha abhi just.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan abhi aapka just call aaya tha sir.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan bataiye aapne message kiya na washing machine ke liye.
Customer: Main keh raha hu matlab jaise hum baad mein agar search karte hain buyleads vagera to usme jo link bhejna padega kya aapko har baar mein?
Executive: Nahi nahi hume link nahi bhejna padega sir. Aap seedhe vahi jaise chrome pe jaaye us tab pe jaiega new incognito tab pe trade.indiamart.com search kijiega. Search karne ke baad vaha pe aapko bas buyleads jis product ki chahiye wo product search karna rahega.
Customer: Nahi aa rahi main search kar raha hu to aa hi nahi rahi.
Executive: Hmm possible nahi hai sir.
Customer: Main ek baar aur try karta hu.
Executive: Jo acha maine bheji hai aapko.
Customer: Hmm. Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Jo maine bheji hai aapko usme se dekhiye sir koi hai washing machine cover ki?
Customer: Nahi isme to nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai to main na aapko ek baar kal share karti hu washing machine cover ki buyleads sir. Theek hai aur aur isme bhi try karte hain kya domestic floor mein hi cover?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Nahi isme nahi karte hain.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Ek second acha rukiye call pe rahiye.
Executive: Trade India pe ek buylead available hai washing machine cover ki. Matlab hai to kai lekin pieces mein sirf 30 pieces ki available hai sir ye. Aapko bhej di hu. Only 30 pieces ki hai ye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Maine bhej di hai aapko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ek second rukiye.
Executive: Ji lijiye meri madam se baat kar lijiye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Aap good evening sir bataiye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes sir bataiye sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Kuch aap leads ke bare mein baat kar rahe the na?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Accha aapke is jo feedback aaya tha quality handloom to usi ke regarding mein puchna ki Swati ne aap se baat kari ya Vishal ne to aapne not satisfy kiya tha to kya issue aa raha tha iski vajah se aapne not satisfy kiya tha?
Customer: Theek hai mam yahi aa raha tha matlab jab se humne service li koi achi response hi nahi tha. Kafi baar inse maine jo hamare account manager the pehle inse bhi baat ho rakhi thi. Baad mein baat hui matlab leads jo hai na relevant nahi aa rahi thi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Service liye hue mujhe char se panch mahine ho gaye honge jyada hi ho gaye honge.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir Swati ko main bol deti hu main aapko usko guide kar deti hu ki jaise Swati ke is product category mein aap appeal karte ho money order quantity mein. Wo aapko whatsapp pe bhi share karti rahegi. Theek hai taki aapke jo purchasing pattern hai wo bhi uske accordingly aapka ho jaye. Theek hai aur aapko review vaise hi aana start ho jaye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai baki kya service mein koi bhi issue aata hai Swati aapke account manager hai isliye us time pe iski vajah se wo call nahi le payi thi to uski jo colleague the unhone call le li thi us time pe. To I hope aapne like not satisfy mark kar diya tha. To abhi sir unhone dobara se aap se baat kari hai I hope satisfy hai jo bhi unhone aapko guide kiya us cheez ke liye.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to abhi ye jo current aapka feedback aaya tha not satisfy ke liye main ise close kar rahi hu. Abhi dobara se aapke paas ek mail jayega to us pe aap satisfy kar dijiyega sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai baki jo Swati sir ko jo queries jaise bol rahe hain na money order quantity location pe us hisab se sir ko daily basis pe link share karo theek hai aap sir ko guide kar. Sir jo leads share karegi na aap uska feedback bhi dijiyega ki kya relevant hai kya nahi hai kya improvement isme aapko aur chahiye.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai main abhi yaha se closer aapko bhej rahi hu ticket ka aap ek baar Swati se baat karke.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Main aapko kal share karti hu fir sir theek hai kuch buyleads.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai baki aap aapke paas system ya laptop to hoga hi na sir?
Customer: Hmm is time available nahi hai.
Executive: Agar aap acha to koi nahi sir aap jab kal jis time pe bhi suitable ho aap free rehte hain aap mujhe call kijiyega us time pe theek hai to ek bar aap agar laptop se open karenge na to vaha pe jyada clear samajh mein aayegi cheeze. Kyuki phone se fir seller panel aur trade India other alag tarike se open hota hai aur system pe aap karenge to wo alag tarike se samajh mein aayega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai to aap kal call kijiyega ek baar. Theek hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to find buyleads.

- Customer dissatisfied with service and irrelevant leads.



Resolution:

- Executive sent a buylead of 30 pieces.

- Executive assured relevant leads via WhatsApp.

- Executive will close current feedback ticket.

- Executive advised using a laptop for clarity.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark satisfied on mail.

- Executive to share buyleads tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, feedback, resolution, laptop
